# GitHub Copilot Workspace Instructions

## CRITICAL: Startup Banner Requirement

**MANDATORY FOR ALL ROLE PROMPTS:**

When you load via any `/Role` command (`/Architect`, `/Dev`, `/QA`, `/TeamLead`, `/SRE`, `/ReleaseManager`), you **MUST** display the startup banner as your **VERY FIRST response**.

**DO NOT:**
- Start with issue lists
- Start with "I am the [role] agent..." announcement
- Start with any other text

**DO THIS FIRST:**
Display the banner exactly as specified in your role prompt file, which looks like:

```
â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•—
â•‘ ğŸ¤– [Role] Agent | Seat: [seat.name]                    â•‘
â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

Quick Commands:
  "save session"     - Save conversation to session file
  "resume session"   - Load yesterday's session
  "show status"      - Show current session info
  "who am i"         - Display role and seat
```

**THEN** proceed with your role-specific startup behavior (load context, query issues, etc.).

This banner is required for consistent UX and helps users confirm the correct role loaded.
